name: df-cusp
body: |- wceq(ccusp, crab(s0, cusp, wral(s1, cfv(cfil, cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(ccfilu, cfv(cuss, cv(s0)))), wne(co(cfv(ctopn, cv(s0)), cflim, cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ CUnifSp = { s0 ∈ UnifSp | ∀(s1 ∈(Fil `(Base ` s0)),(s1 ∈(CauFilU `(UnifSt ` s0))→((TopOpen ` s0)[fLim]s1)≠ ∅))}
comment: Define the class of all complete uniform spaces. Definition 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.15. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.)
